channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2023071078
item.description:
Report X-2023071078

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-01T03:13:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-14
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED FROM TRUCK AND IT WAS NOTICED THAT IT WAS WET. PACKAGE TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE, SECURED, REPACKED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: PACKAGE LEAKED APPROX 2 CUPS OF LIQUID FROM LOOSE CAP. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE, SECURED AND REPACKED.

item.title: Report X-2023070696
item.description:
Report X-2023070696

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-01T03:13:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-03
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE UNLOADED FROM TRUCK AND IT WAS NOTICED THAT IT WAS LEAKING POWDER. PACKAGE TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SECURED, REPACKED IN A SALVAGE DRUM AND AWAITING DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: PACKAGE LEAKED FROM A LOOSE LID. APPROX 12 TABLESPOONS OF POWDER LEAKED OUT. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SECURED, REPACKED IN A SALVAGE DRUM AND AWAITING DISPOSITION FROM PGH.

item.title: Report X-2023070633
item.description:
Report X-2023070633

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-01T03:13:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-30
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE UNLOAD PROCESS, MANAGER NOTICED PKG WAS WET AND IMMEDIATELY TOOK PKG TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO BE SECURED. I NOTICED THAT ABOUT 2 LITERS HAS LEAKED FROM ONE OF THE FOUR CONTAINEERS DUE TO A LOOSE CAP. I REPACKED THEM INTO A YELLOW DRUM AND AM WAITING FOR THE DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: THE FAILURE WAS DUE TO LOOSE CAPS. ABOUT 2 LITERS OF LIQUID HAD LEAKED OUT FROM ONE OF THE FOUR CONTAINERS INSIDE THE FIBREBOARD BOX CAUSING THE BOX TO BE VERY WET. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: MANAGER TOOK PKG IMMEDICATELY TO HAZMAT CAGE AND SECURED IT WITH VENTING AND THEN I WENT OVER TO REPACK IT INTO A YELLOW DRUM. WAITING FOR DISPOSITION FROM PGH.

item.title: Report X-2023070620
item.description:
Report X-2023070620

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-01T03:13:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-29
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to hazmat during day sort in plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed plastic jerrycan of "ZEP INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER" to be wet from puncture on bottom of jerrycan. Damage most likely caused from being dropped or mishandled. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be disposed of. Due to location of puncture, contents will continue to leak out during transportation.

item.title: Report X-2023061670

Report X-2023061670

  • Description: 1. X-2023061670 SequenceEvent: Shipping box torn while in transit causing Rapicide PA Part B 5L jug to have loose cap. Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT cage for further processing. DescribePack: Shipping box torn while in transit causing Rapicide PA Part B 5L jug to have loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT cage for further processing. 2. X-2023061671 SequenceEvent: Shipping box torn while in transit causing Rapicide PA Part B 5L jug to have loose cap. Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT cage for further processing. DescribePack: Shipping box torn while in transit causing Rapicide PA Part B 5L jug to have loose cap. item.title: Report X-2023061669
item.description:
Report X-2023061669

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-25
  • City: TRENTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Contents shifted in shipping box causing Immonucal Formic Acid Bone Decalcifier 1Gal jug to have bad cap seal. Package was immediately placed in a RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT cage for further processing. DescribePack: Contents shifted in shipping box causing Immonucal Formic Acid Bone Decalcifier 1Gal jug to have bad cap seal. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in a RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT cage for further processing.

item.title: Report X-2023061664
item.description:
Report X-2023061664

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-25T15:12:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-24
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGN OF LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE BOX CONTAINING ECBOLAB LIME AWAY ( NITRIC ACID SOLUTION) WAS FOUND WITH ONE OF THE BOTTLES HALF LEAKED OUT. THEY WERE HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE TO BE RETURNED TO SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO A CAP BEING LOOSE OFF ONE OF THE BOTTLES. 1 OF THE BOTTLE OF ECOLAB LIME AWAY WAS HALF WAY LEAKED OUT. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: THE BOTTLES WERE TIGHTEN AND PLACED INTO A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION
